members.joinCircumstances: Founded the Sun Pirates after freeing slaves from Mary Geoise and returning to Fish-Man Island as a hero.
Inspired by Fisher Tiger's heroic actions, Jinbe left the Neptune Army to join the Sun Pirates.
Arlong and his gang from the Fish-Man District joined the Sun Pirates under Tiger's leadership.
Macro and his subordinates joined the Sun Pirates when it was formed.
As a former slave freed by Tiger, Aladine joined the Sun Pirates and serves as the crew's doctor.

keyMoments.title: Formation of the Sun Pirates
keyMoments.description: Fisher Tiger establishes the Sun Pirates after his legendary raid on Mary Geoise, creating a crew primarily of freed fish-men slaves.
keyMoments.significance: Creates one of the most important pirate crews in One Piece history, symbolizing freedom from slavery.

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Joins
keyMoments.description: Jinbe leaves the Neptune Army to join the Sun Pirates, inspired by Tiger's heroism.
keyMoments.significance: Beginning of Jinbe's pirate journey that leads to his eventual Warlord status.

keyMoments.title: Arlong Joins
keyMoments.description: Arlong and his gang join the Sun Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Arlong's backstory and connection to the crew before his East Blue activities.

ships.description: The Sun Pirates' ship, details not fully shown in this episode.

bases.description: Fish-Man Island served as the initial base before the crew set out to sea.

jollyRoger.description: A sun symbol with a face in the center, representing freedom from the slave brand and new beginning. The design completely covers the Hoof of the Soaring Dragon slave mark.
